text.section: The Commission shall establish an appraisal management company hearing board.

section.section: The hearing board consists of three members of the Commission, appointed by the Commission.

Of the three positions on the appraisal management company hearing board:
one shall be a representative of a financial institution;
one shall be a consumer member; and
one shall be a representative of an appraisal management company.

text.section: From among the members of the hearing board, the Commission shall designate a chair.
